svcproc.title: STEERING COLUMN
svcproc.para: The tilt/telescoping steering column assembly can be moved toward or away from the driver. The adjustment lever is located on the left side of the steering column. To unlock and adjust the tilt/telescoping steering column position, push the lever down, move the column to the desired position, and then pull the lever up to lock the tilt/telescoping steering column in position. The tilt/telescoping steering column features a stowaway position for easy entry and exit.
